name: Play Drums
description:
Hi there! Please download the GAME and enjoy. I suggest you to download the GAME from your Android device by Click these Google Drive Link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1hEfqrevnr0zF_6x7RLT2E7xRV-GpL5_0?usp=sha... or, you can download the file "Play Drums.apk (Google Drive Link)".

DISCLAIMER

The Developer of this game is not a sound expert. The game has been made only for fun. I hope you will like my efforts. Thankyou!
